# stopVideoCapture()

**Instance Method**

Stops video capture.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func stopVideoCapture()
```

## Discussion

After you call this method to stop video capture, the system calls the image picker delegate’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIImagePickerControllerDelegate/imagePickerController(_:didFinishPickingMediaWithInfo:)] method.

## Capturing still images or movies

- **takePicture()**: Captures a still image using the camera.
- **startVideoCapture()**: Starts video capture using the camera specified by the camera device property.
